Package STARSapp

Class Time

java.lang.Object
STARSapp.Ser_File
STARSapp.Time
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Time
extends Ser_File
Serializable object containing the access period for student users. There is only one such file called "Access Period" in the folder.
Since:
2020-11-22
Version:
1.0
Author:
Huang Runtao
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Time

      public Time​(java.time.LocalDate start_date, java.time.LocalDate end_date, java.time.LocalTime start_time, java.time.LocalTime end_time)
      Creates a new Time object.
      Parameters:
      start_date - The first day when students can start to log in to the application.
      end_date - The last day when students can start to log in to the application.
      start_time - The start time for students to access the system every day.
      end_time - The end time for students to access the system every day.
